newsitem.title: USA: ABC Rail president, COO Yorks retires.
newsitem.headline: ABC Rail president, COO Yorks retires.

text.p: ABC Rail Products Corp said that Ben Yorks, president and chief operating officer, has taken early retirement from the company for health reasons.
There are no immediate plans to replace Yorks as president and chief operating officer, the company said.
"The board of directors is reviewing the question of replacing Yorks," chief executive officer Donald Grinter said.

Yorks also submitted his resignation as a director of the company, effective immediately, the company said, adding that the board of directors is reducing the size of the board from eight to seven members.
ABC Rail Products engineers, manufactures, and markets replacement products and original equipment for the freight railroad and rail transit industries.
